"wie kann man noch immer davon sprechen, dass es in zeitalter von big data und surveillance capitalism keine privatsph채re gibt? gibt es 체berhaupt noch ein recht auf informationelle selbstbestimmung? #privatsph채re #datenschutz #bigdata #surveillancecapitalism"

translation: "how can we still talk about the absence of privacy in the age of big data and surveillance capitalism? is there still a right to informational self-determination? #privacy #dataprotection #bigdata #surveillancecapitalism"

this post critically examines the issue of personal data protection and privacy in the context of big data and surveillance capitalism. the user is questioning whether there still exists a right to informational self-determination, suggesting that the current state of data collection and usage by corporations and governments may be eroding this right. the hashtags #privatsph채re (privacy), #datenschutz (data protection), #bigdata, and #surveillancecapitalism indicate the topic and frame the discussion within the broader context of data privacy and capitalist exploitation.
